name: SliverOverlapInjector
desc: A sliver that has a sliver geometry based on the values stored in a [SliverOverlapAbsorberHandle].

fields.name: handle
fields.desc: The handle to the [SliverOverlapAbsorber] that is feeding this injector.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of SliverOverlapInjector
desc: If the SliverOverlapAbsorber and SliverOverlapInjector components are not used, the content of the NestedScrollView will overlap with the header bar.
